extensionDescription.message: Add Superpowers to your Trello board. Resizable lists, visible label text, compact mode and much more...

settingsSavedNotificationTitle.description: Notification title when settings are updated.

settingsSavedNotificationBody.message: Reload your Trello boards for changes to take effect.
settingsSavedNotificationBody.description: Instuctions for the user in order for the changes to take effect.

settingsCompactTitle.description: Name of the Compact Mode feature.

settingsCompactDescription.message: Adds a button that lets you quickly toggle Compact Mode. When in Compact Mode, tags, assignations, attachments and more are hidden, so you can focus on your tasks.
settingsCompactDescription.description: Description of the Compact Mode feature.

settingsLabelTitle.description: Name of the visible label text feature.

settingsLabelDescription.message: Shows the text of labels by default. Note: Although Trello now supports this feature, it is not enabled by default and does not look as good as the styles provided by Trello Super Powers.
settingsLabelDescription.description: Description of the visible label text feature.

settingsIdTitle.description: Name of the Show Card IDs feature.

settingsIdTitleHover.description: Name of the Card IDs on hover feature.

settingsIdDescription.message: Click on IDs to save them to your clipboard! Paste them in a comment and Trello will automatically show the corresponding card.
settingsIdDescription.description: Description of the card IDs on hover feature.

settingsNumberListTitle.description: Name of the Number of cards per list feature.

settingsNumberListDescription.message: Shows a small indicator in each list with the number of cards in it.
settingsNumberListDescription.description: Description of the cards per list feature.

injectIdNotificationBody.message: Card ID saved to your clipboard.
injectIdNotificationBody.description: Message body when a user clicks on a card ID.

pageAction_exportToCSV_optionFileName_ti.description: Name of the option to choose a file name.

pageAction_exportToCSV_optionDelimiter_t.description: Name of the option to choose a delimiter (seperator).

pageAction_exportToCSV_optionDelimiter_c.description: Hint for the name of the character ','

pageAction_exportToCSV_optionDelimiter_s.description: Hint for the name of the character ';'

pageAction_exportToCSV_optionIncludeArch.description: Name of the option to optionally inlcude also arcived cards.
